title: RTL & Hebrew Testing
description: Test all components and pages in RTL Hebrew mode. Verify no visual regressions in LTR English mode. IMPORTANT: This task is partially TDD — fe-008 and fe-009 (full Hebrew translation audit) are running in parallel and may not be complete when qa-007 starts. For components that are still WIP (not yet fully translated), write the tests anyway as TDD — they will fail now and pass once FE finishes. Do NOT skip or defer tests because a component is untranslated. Write the spec, mark it clearly with a comment like '// TDD: awaiting fe-008/fe-009 completion', and let it fail. This gives FE a clear target.
acceptance_criteria: All E2E tests pass with locale set to Hebrew/RTL
Visual check: all card layouts correct in RTL
Visual check: all forms aligned correctly in RTL
Visual check: all modals render correctly in RTL
Visual check: navigation and headers correct in RTL
Animations work correctly in both directions
No regressions: all existing E2E tests still pass in English/LTR
notes: Run full E2E suite twice: once in English, once in Hebrew. Compare screenshots if possible. fe-008 and fe-009 are running in parallel — expect some Hebrew keys to be missing during development. Write tests for the full expected Hebrew experience regardless.
